name: A Penguin Walks Into a Bar
name_original: A Penguin Walks Into a Bar
description:
Created for GMTK GameJam 2020. 

Theme: "Out of Control"

You are a penguin out to cause mischief in a bar.

Tap things to interact with them. Stir up trouble! Steal wallets, buy beer, and drink as many as you can!
